Name: Medical verdict
About the game: Try to pass a virtual medical examination with realistic graphics with a first-person view! Your attention is represented by the following doctors and procedures: 1. Therapist 2. Ophthalmologist 3. The psychiatrist 4. MRI 5. X-ray 6. Gastroscopy 7. Analyzes 8. Sexologist All inspections are accompanied by individual mini-games for reaction speed, luck and endurance. At the end, each player receives an individual virtual health score on a fractional 100-point scale. Compete against each other! Collect points, open bonuses and remember that this is just a game!
